extendedInfo.description: Translates any phrase and speaks it out in local language. Around 30 languages supported. No more language problems anywhere you travel!- Send to SMS/email/twitter/facebook etc.- Text to Speech TTS with around 20 languages- speech speed setting (Menu->Settings)Much more than a dictionary!Arabic, Chinese, Japanese, English, Spanish, Dutch, Norwegian, French, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, German, Hindi etc. you name it. Please check also the Youtube video for Trippo VoiceMagix, Speech to speech translator.Uses proprietary high quality speech recognition with very high accuracy.1.1.5: Support for Droid, Milestone.

reviews.title: For what it is - it\'s great!
reviews.comment: It\'s FREE, has a large selection of languages, it\'s FREE, will actually \"speak\" most of the translations so you can learn how to pronounce them, it\'s FREE, you can send the translations in messages, and it\'s FREE! LOL  What more can you ask for something that costs you nothing?  Just keep in mind that most of the time you will get a very literal translation, so idioms, slang, etc are unlikely to translate well.  It\'s a bigger plus than it is a minus.   ~Samsung Infuse 4G
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just needs one (1) thing!
reviews.comment: This app works beautifully!! It would be a real 5-star app if it had a \'Clear Text\' function.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Frequent flier
reviews.comment: This app comes in handy for helping me get what i need out. From my trips to Mexico all the way to Singapore im covered. Just add more languages in the future and its perfect. Even if you lose you\'re voice its great for that too!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sweet!
reviews.comment: This app is great for ideal conversation.  It\'ll speak for you too in case you don\'t know to pronounce some words.  Thanks this is great for study.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is a great translator works great on droid ... I have tried other app that i have paid for and this is still better .... 2 thumbs up !
